entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Point Escuminac
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:52 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.0°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow along parts of the coast. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow along parts of the coast. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
